sub_title: Service Delivery Manager Deployable CIS at NATO Communications and Information Agency (NCI Agency)
summary:
Highly skilled and motivated leader, responsible for the Service Delivery Management (SDM) of NATO’s Deployable Communication Information Systems (DCIS) assets.  Experienced in ITIL 4 and PRINCE2 processes. Consultancy Director and highly accomplished, retired Royal Air Force Engineering Officer of 26 years active service, delivering static and deployable CIS services alongside NATO and coalition partners. Vast number of operational theatre experiences includes multiple deployments to Europe, The Middle East, Turkey, Kosovo, the Balkans, and civilian consultancy work in Beirut and with Australia’s indigenous communities. Accredited for building lasting relationships across diverse cultural and politically sensitive environments. Through a variety of skills, qualifications and experiences, has developed impeccable self-discipline, dedication, integrity, flexibility and diversity.

Love the outdoors, hiking and also swimming.  Regular yoga and meditation practice while passionate about learning new cultures and developing language skills. 

Key Skills
Service Delivery Management
Programme and change management 
Business continuity and risk management
Technical and Safety Instructor 
Crisis management 
Qualified and experienced CELTA/TEFL educator
Working knowledge of Italian, German and Turkish and basic Dutch languages

courses.name: Foundation Cert in IT Service Management
IMS Lead Auditor
courses.number: RABQSA AU TL OH QM EM

profile_positions.description:
Experienced and knowledgeable senior consultant providing professional guidance on State regulatory licensing, business risk, WHS/OHS legislation and compliance matters, asbestos management, assessment and removal requirements.  Working closely with clients within the following industries:

	Communication, Information Systems (CIS)
	Construction
	Utility 
	Traffic Management 

Highly professional trainer and assessor delivering various WHS and Traffic Control/Management courses along with the full range of nationally accredited Asbestos Assessor, Removal (A & B class), Supervisor and Awareness training courses across Victoria, interstate and Internationally.  Assessed, corrected and reissued a range of training course materials for several Regional Training Organisations (RTOs).  

Received consistent positive feedback regarding style and delivery methods increasing business for training organisations and my consultancy 

Range of friable and non friable asbestos removal experience, including roof removal/work at heights and, management of friable asbestos removal of two high pressure vessels completed on behalf of the Lebanese government in Beirut. On site traffic control and implementation of Traffic Management Planning experience working alongside several clients.  Provide Asbestos licensing advice and liaison services with the VIC Worksafe Regulator for clients new to asbestos industry.  

Lead auditor providing government sponsored audits for internship program across Melbourne and Victoria.  Senior consultant for multiple clients advising on Integrated Management Systems (IMS) including Health and Safety, Environmental and Quality Assurance systems.  Completing audits and providing guidance for IMS certification to AS/NZS & ISO standards 4801/19001, 14001 and 9001:2015. Experienced and competent workplace risk and manual handling assessor.
profile_positions.title: Senior consultant - Educator/Assessor - Lead Auditor - Risk Assessor - Asbestos (ACM) Removalist

profile_positions.description:
Provide ESOL education and support to underprivileged youths.

	Providing regular after school and pre-exam high quality English language classes.

	Responsible for the safety and welfare of youths in my care during lessons and on regular weekend welfare trips away from home.

	Provide ESOL lessons to staff members of the SOS Kinderdorf.
 
Lesson preparation and teaching ESOL to private clients, including business owners, university students and young adults.
profile_positions.title: Youth Support Worker/English Teacher to Adults and Second Language Learners

profile_positions.location: Various - UK, Europe, Balkans, Asia and the Middle East
profile_positions.description:
•	Directly responsible for implementation of business continuity and change/risk management programs within the military telecommunication networks throughout Germany and Europe
•	Certifying compliance with safety legislation and quality requirements 
•	Supervising administration for up to 50 engineering/technical and administrative staff, including recruitment, rostering, individual/team performance, counselling and report writing
•	Successful project manager overseeing part closure of engineering department, including staff and asset relocation, adherence to transition timelines, staff hiring and redundancies requirements
•	Enabling conformity of engineering department audit program (ISO 9001) including information management systems by engaging proactive communication across stakeholders
•	Chairman of Safety Committee ensuring satisfactory resolution of non compliance reports and successful risk reduction across departments through joint safety awareness programme
•	Managing civilian contractor compliance in logistics, vehicle leasing and maintenance department
•	Created improved relationships with internal and external engineering support units and international partners using face to face approach, earning their respect and notable commendations/awards
•	Became the “go to” problem solver for unique technical and staff issues across several international CIS deployments
•	Directly responsible for the provision, maintenance and support of tactical (mobile) CIS across a range of short notice and fixed deployment requirements across Europe, the 
•	Satellite Ground Terminal technician, providing timely and effective troubleshooting of the baseband systems, the RF payload and network management system
•	Delivering telecommunication training and development of training packages to engineering and civilian staff
•	Dogged management and control of the storage, use and transportation of dangerous goods
profile_positions.title: CIS Engineering Officer, previously Senior Non Commissioned Officer and initially CIS Technician
